name: Roll Goll
description:
Roll Goll!

A Game to SHOOT the Ball in the Goal!

3 Different Maps boiiii !

Let the Dice Decide Your Fate boiii !!!

Read "How to Play" Before Playing ! 

How To Play :- 

You are the ball. There are 6 baskets. There is a dice in the starting. The dice rolls to give a number. The ball needs to go towards the basket of that number. The score is decided by the number of shots you take to reach the goal. After you reach the goal, the dice rolls again and you get a new target and vice versa. Note that you may also get the same target as you are in so just come out and in that target again.

Also, Please Speedrun This Game Too !

Controls :-
  • Left Mouse Button to Shoot the Ball.
  • Right Mouse Button or Q to See the Target.
  • Esc to Escape
